author: ituckey
title: Bayern Munich create own version of the famous intro to TV show Friends
text: Ribery shows unusual moves as Bayern players star in the Friends-style video Getty Images Bayern and Germany's Manuel Neuer in more typical action - saving a penalty most read in football Not good enough Antonio Conte has sensationally rejected the chance to sign Neymar in a £155m deal from Barcelona leg-break horror Seamus Coleman set for surgery on potential career-threatening injury after his leg is snapped in half by Neil Taylor's wild tackle TV TIMES What TV channel is England vs Lithuania on, what time is kick-off and what is the latest team news? LIONHEART Brave Bradley Lowery gets the biggest cheer at Wembley as he leads out the England team with goal hero and best mate Jermain Defoe Seeing Red Keith Gillespie launches viscous elbow into face of opponent during Man United charity match 'I don't even like football' Neil Taylor is hammered on Twitter after breaking Seamus Coleman’s leg… but it’s an ex-councillor not the Wales defender taking the brunt of the abuse AND THIS IS HOW THE ORIGINAL COMPARES... 'I'll be there for you' by The Rembrandts as Friends theme tune in 1994
